title: Dashboard Playground
description: Test your queries and see how they would appear in the dashboard before adding them to your project.
configurationDescription: Enter your API keys and test parameters to simulate a dashboard view
openAiApiKeyDescription: Your OpenAI API key for GPT models
projectDomainDescription: Your clinic or medical facility domain
keywordQueryDescription: The medical service or query to test (e.g., "dental implants", "best cardiologist")
simulatedDashboardView: Simulated dashboard view based on your test query
runSimulationToSee: Run a simulation to see the dashboard preview
runningComprehensiveAnalysis: Running comprehensive analysis of your domain and query...
simulationPreview: This is a simulation preview. Results are not saved to your project.
fillInConfiguration: Fill in the configuration above and click "Simulate Dashboard" to see results
invalidApiKeys: Invalid API keys. Please check your OpenAI and Perplexity API keys.

3_1.title: 3.1. llms.txt File Presence
3_1.description: Check for llms.txt file to help AI systems.

3_2.title: 3.2. llms.txt Optimization
3_2.description: Analyze llms.txt content for completeness and structure recommendations.

3_3.title: 3.3. robots.txt Presence
3_3.description: File helps search and AI robots properly index the site.

3_4.title: 3.4. robots.txt Configuration
3_4.description: Check access rules and sitemap presence.

3_5.title: 3.5. HTTPS
3_5.description: Secure data transfer protocol. Critical for medical sites.

3_8.title: 3.8. LocalBusiness Schema
3_8.description: Data about name, address, phone and business hours.

3_9.title: 3.9. Physician Schema
3_9.description: Markup for individual doctors, their specializations and achievements.

3_10.title: 3.10. MedicalSpecialty Schema
3_10.description: Classification of specific medical fields of the clinic.

3_11.title: 3.11. MedicalProcedure Schema
3_11.description: Description of diagnostic and treatment procedures.

3_12.title: 3.12. FAQ Schema
3_12.description: Markup for frequently asked questions for rich snippets.

3_13.title: 3.13. Review Schema
3_13.description: Helps AI identify reviews and ratings.

3_15.title: 3.15. Lang
3_15.description: Content language attribute for browsers and AI.

3_16.title: 3.16. Hreflang
3_16.description: Indication of language or regional page versions.

3_17.title: 3.17. External Links
3_17.description: Quality and relevance of links to external resources.

3_18.title: 3.18. Titles
3_18.description: Page titles: length, uniqueness and keywords.

3_19.title: 3.19. Descriptions
3_19.description: Meta descriptions: uniqueness and click appeal (CTR).

3_20.title: 3.20. Canonicals
3_20.description: Indication of priority page version to avoid duplicates.

3_21.title: 3.21. Noindex
3_21.description: Hiding technical or low-value pages from indexing.

3_22.title: 3.22. Nofollow
3_22.description: Managing link weight transfer to external resources.

3_23.title: 3.23. Content Duplicates
3_23.description: Search for pages with content similarity over 80%.

validation.domainInvalid: Please enter a valid domain (e.g., mayoclinic.org)
